subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester United took over second place in the English Premier League with a 2-0 victory over Chelsea in Chelsea’s first game since the departure of Manager José Mourinho. Carlos Tévez and Louis Saha scored to extend Chelsea’s winless streak to four games in all competitions and hand Avram Grant a defeat in his first game in charge.
